flavorText:
"To death all must go, and so in death lies ultimate power."
—Geth, Lord of the Vault

foreignData.flavorText: „Sterben müssen alle, daher hat der Tod die absolute Macht." —Geth, Fürst der Gruft
foreignData.name: Nekrotischer Schlamm
foreignData.text: So lange der Nekrotische Schlamm im Spiel ist, hat er alle aktivierten Fähigkeiten aller Kreaturenkarten in allen Friedhöfen.

foreignData.flavorText: "Todos caminamos hacia la muerte, así que en la muerte debe estar el poder definitivo." —Geth, Señor de la Bóveda
foreignData.name: Cieno necrótico
foreignData.text: Mientras el Cieno necrótico esté en el campo de batalla, tiene todas las habilidades activadas de todas las cartas de criatura en todos los cementerios.

foreignData.flavorText: « Tout s'achemine vers la mort. Par conséquent, c'est dans la mort qu'on trouve le pouvoir ultime. » —Geth, seigneur du Caveau
foreignData.name: Limon nécrotique
foreignData.text: Tant que le Limon nécrotique est sur le champ de bataille, il a toutes les capacités activées de toutes les cartes de créature dans tous les cimetières.

foreignData.flavorText: "Tutti devono morire e quindi è nella morte che si trova il potere assoluto." —Geth, Signore della Cripta
foreignData.name: Melma Necrotica
foreignData.text: Fintanto che la Melma Necrotica è sul campo di battaglia, ha tutte le abilità attivate di tutte le carte creatura in tutti i cimiteri.

foreignData.flavorText: 「死はすべての行き着く先。それ故に死には究極の力がある。」 ――大霊堂の王、ゲス
foreignData.name: 壊死のウーズ
foreignData.text: 壊死のウーズが戦場に出ているかぎり、それはすべての墓地にあるすべてのクリーチャー・カードの起動型能力を持つ。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — ウーズ

foreignData.flavorText: "A morte é o destino de todos, portanto, nela reside o poder absoluto." — Geth, Senhor da Câmara
foreignData.name: Lodo Necrótico
foreignData.text: Enquanto Lodo Necrótico estiver no campo de batalha, ele terá todas as habilidades ativadas de todos os cards de criatura em todos os cemitérios.

foreignData.flavorText: «Смерть забирает всех, так что в смерти кроется абсолютная власть». — Гет, повелитель Подземелья
foreignData.name: Некротическая Тина
foreignData.text: Пока Некротическая Тина находится на поле битвы, она имеет все активируемые способности всех карт существ на всех кладбищах.

foreignData.flavorText: 「万物终将死去，因此死亡蕴藏着终极力量。」 ～黯窖之王盖司
foreignData.name: 溃疽流浆
foreignData.text: 只要溃疽流浆在战场上，它便具有所有坟墓场中每张生物牌的所有起动式异能。

foreignData.flavorText: 「萬物終將死去，因此死亡蘊藏著終極力量。」 ～黯窖之王蓋司
foreignData.name: 潰疽流漿
foreignData.text: 只要潰疽流漿在戰場上，它便具有所有墳墓場中每張生物牌的所有起動式異能。

name: Necrotic Ooze
originalText: As long as Necrotic Ooze is on the battlefield, it has all activated abilities of all creature cards in all graveyards.

rulings.text: Necrotic Ooze gains only activated abilities. It doesn’t gain keyword abilities (unless those keyword abilities are activated), triggered abilities, or static abilities.
Activated abilities contain a colon. They’re generally written “[Cost]: [Effect].” Some keywords are activated abilities; they have colons in their reminder text.

If an activated ability of a card in a graveyard references the card it’s printed on by name, treat Necrotic Ooze’s version of that ability as though it referenced Necrotic Ooze by name instead. For example, if Cudgel Troll (which says “{G}: Regenerate Cudgel Troll”) is in a graveyard, Necrotic Ooze has the ability “{G}: Regenerate Necrotic Ooze.”

text: As long as Necrotic Ooze is on the battlefield, it has all activated abilities of all creature cards in all graveyards.
